level.heading: Maximum stay policy.
level.text: The Mayor shall devise a policy that encourages tenant businesses to leave the business incubators when a certain level of development is reached, but does not arbitrarily evict a tenant business at a crucial period in its development.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-71, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 2-1209.01.
